product_name: Mountain House Beef Stroganoff with Noodles Pro-Pak - 2 Servings
long_description: Mountain House Beef Stroganoff with Noodles Pro-Pak lets you enjoy tender beef chunks smothered in noodles, mushrooms, and a rich sour cream sauce. Just mix contents with boiling water in the pouch provided, let stand for a few minutes, and then serve; resealable foil pouch helps retain warmth. Compact vacuum pouch leaves more room in your pack and won't expand at high elevations. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Mountain House Beef Stroganoff with Noodles Pro-Pak lets you enjoy tender beef chunks smothered in noodles, mushrooms, and a rich sour cream sauce.
